name: steam wide trades and offers
description:
Make trade offer and other lists of items wider with less empty space.  Works great with Husky's trade offer enhancer - http://forums.backpack.tf/index.php?/topic/17946-script-steam-trade-offer-enhancer/

Widens:
- inventory history 
https://steamcommunity.com/my/inventoryhistory/

- live trade 
https://steamcommunity/trade/x

- lists of offers received and sent 
https://steamcommunity.com/my/tradeoffers

- trade offer response page 
steamcommunity.com/tradeoffer/[trade offer id]
